H0.text: who named all the animals in the world. Noah

H1.text: who named all the animals in the world. Zeus

H2.text: who named all the animals in the world. Brahma

H3.text: who named all the animals in the world. Adam

A4.text: This list includes names of mythical creatures such as the griffin, lamia, siren and unicorn, which have been applied to real animals in some older translations of the Bible due to misunderstandings or educational prejudices of the Greek and Latin translators.
